name: Sends Beacons to Scan for Active ZigBee Networks
author: Craig Smith
description:
Post Module to send beacon signals to the broadcast address while
                               channel hopping

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: CHANNEL
options.description: Disable channel hopping by forcing a channel (11-26)

options.name: LOOP
options.description: How many times to loop over the channels (-1 will run in an endless loop)

options.name: DELAY
options.description: Delay in seconds to listen on each channel

options.name: DEVICE
options.description: ZigBee device ID, defaults to target device
